DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Overall , 10 - 15 % couple seek specialist help live spontaneous pregnancy occur . These couple define subfertile least one year unprotected intercourse without conceive . Subfertility different cause . A basic fertility work-up focus reproductive system couple . After basic fertility work-up subfertility remain unexplained 16-24 % couple . The investigator hypothesize cardio-metabolic hemodynamic abnormality reduce cardiovascular reserve relate circulatory redistribution expense uterine perfusion woman 's fertility . This could especially important subgroup unexplained subfertility decrease ovarian reserve . For possible assessed abnormality , proven effective treatment available primarily life style corrective action . Furthermore intervention could lead good result fertility treatment , good obstetric outcome reduce lifelong health risk . Objective : The overall objective study examine specific cardio-metabolic cardiovascular parameter woman subfertile couple . This study protocol divide 3 study evaluate several cardio-metabolic/cardiovascular parameter different subgroup female subfertility compare fertile woman . - Study 1 `` The metabolic syndrome female subfertility '' : The prevalence metabolic syndrome woman assess subfertility compare fertile woman . - Study 2 `` The cardiovascular profile female subfertility '' : The cardiovascular profile woman female subfertility classify unexplained subfertility `` expect '' decrease ovarian reserve compare fertile woman . For study 4 measurement perform : uterine artery pulsatility index ( PI ) measure uterine perfusion , plasma volume measure venous reserve capacity , intima medium thickness carotid artery proxy chronic strain endothelial function , measure flow mediate dilatation ( FMD ) brachial artery . - Study 3 `` The cardiovascular profile woman poor ovarian response '' : The cardiovascular profile woman In Vitro Fertilisation ( IVF ) population `` proven '' decrease ovarian reserve With different study , investigator hope identify possible cardio-metabolic/cardiovascular cause female subfertility . This lead new treatment option female subfertility , enhance reproductive obstetric outcome , risk assessment later life . Study design : We want perform cross-sectional study . Study population : Study 1 : - Study group : subfertile woman 18 41 year visit fertility clinic Maastricht University Medical Centre primary secondary subfertility , independent cause subfertility - Control group : woman history uneventful spontaneous pregnancy Study 2 : Women finish basic fertility work diagnose : - unexplained subfertility : study group 1 - `` expect '' decrease ovarian reserve : study group 2 Control group : woman history uneventful spontaneous pregnancy Study 3 : Women receive IVF treatment period 2010 - 2012 : - study group : `` proven '' decrease ovarian response , define retrieve 3 oocyte less ovum pick-up , despite maximal ovarian stimulation - control group : receive IVF/Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) treatment severe male subfertility Main study parameter : Study 1 : Prevalence metabolic syndrome subfertile woman compare fertile control . Study 2 : The cardiovascular profile , woman unexplained subfertility `` expect '' decrease ovarian reserve , consist : 1 . The uterine artery pulsatility index measure uterine perfusion 2 . The plasma volume measure venous reserve capacity 3 . The intima medium thickness ( IMT ) carotid artery proxy chronic strain 4 . The endothelial function vascular system ( FMD ) Study 3 : The cardiovascular profile , woman poor ovarian response , consist : 1 . The uterine artery pulsatility index measure uterine perfusion 2 . The plasma volume measure venous reserve capacity 3 . The intima medium thickness ( IMT ) carotid artery proxy chronic strain 4 . The endothelial function vascular system ( FMD )
DOC.criteria: Study 1 Study group : primary subfertility , define previous pregnancy , secondary subfertility , define fertility problem ongoing pregnancy age 18 41 year Control group : woman uneventful pregnancy history least 6 month post partum age 18 41 year Study 2 Study group : primary subfertility , define previous pregnancy , secondary subfertility , define fertility problem ongoing pregnancy age 18 41 year participation study 1 abnormality basic fertility work ( `` unexplained subfertility '' ) ; study group 1 , `` expect '' decrease ovarian reserve ( Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) > 8 u/l ) ; study group 2 Control group : woman uneventful pregnancy history least 6 month post partum age 18 41 year Study 3 Study group : primary subfertility , define previous pregnancy , secondary subfertility , define fertility problem ongoing pregnancy age 18 40 year IVF / ICSI treatment period 2010 2012 proven decrease ovarian response ( ≤ 3 oocyte ovumpick ) maximal stimulation dosage 250 IU FSH per day Control group : primary secondary subfertility age 18 40 year IVF / ICSI treatment period 2010 2012 severe male factor ( TMC < 3 million spermatozoon ) retrieve ≥ 4 oocyte ovumpick normal stimulation dosage 150 IU FSH per day Study 1 There exclusion criterion study metabolic syndrome subfertile study group . For control group exclusion criterion : current pregnancy hormonal medication breastfeed Study 2 For study measurement uterine artery PI , plasma volume , intima medium thickness endothelial function exclusion criterion woman : hypertension , define blood pressure exceed 140 mm Hg systolic 90 mm Hg diastolic , use antihypertensive medication diabetes mellitus , define fast glucose level 6,1 mmol/L use antidiabetic medication Additional exclusion criterion control group : hormonal medication current pregnancy breastfeeding Study 3 For study group well control group exclusion criterion : extirpation ovary cystectomy
